article_title: Agentic AI is changing online meeting platforms: Moving from silent observer to active participant
summary: The article discusses the shift in online meeting platforms toward agentic AI, where AI goes beyond passive observation to actively participating in meetings. Companies like Zoom, Microsoft, Cisco, and Otter AI are introducing agentic AI features to enhance meetings. Otter AI, for example, has developed an AI Meeting Agent that can actively engage in conversations, provide insights, and even conduct meetings autonomously. This marks a significant development in the evolution of AI in online meetings.
